se.cbb.jprime.math

Class PRNG

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Random
      • org.uncommons.maths.random.MersenneTwisterRNG
        • se.cbb.jprime.math.PRNG
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.uncommons.maths.random.RepeatableRNG, InfoProvider

    public class PRNG
extends org.uncommons.maths.random.MersenneTwisterRNG
implements InfoProvider
    Extension of a Mersenne twister pseudo-random number generator. In the future, may be used for adding functionality like specialised serialisation, statistics, etc.
    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
